column4: in terminal\ftp after i've logged into a site why wont dir show me any files/dir's i get a msg saying 200 port command successful, whats going on
uhm, try typing "passive" just after logging in to the server
it saved it into your current directory, that is the directory mentioned right in your shell prompt
if it just has a tilde, then it's your home directory, i.e. /home/yourusername
